casebody.data:
John T. TURCHIN and Susan Turchin
v.
ENBE, LLC No. 306P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 12, 2016. Mr. Tyler R. Moffatt, Attorney at Law, For Turchin, John A., et al. Mr. Phillip E. Lewis, Mr. Christopher Thomas Hood, Attorneys at Law, For ENBE, LLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th of August 2016 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
